articles.title: Russia celebs lose jobs and are jailed in backlash to raunchy party - Business Insider
articles.description: Russian celebrities are issuing groveling apologies as they face major backlash to Anastasia Ivleeva's raunchy party.
articles.content: Fallout from a raunchy party in Moscow that shocked Russian society has spiraled, with several celebrities facing boycotts, a lawsuit, and even jail time.The party was organized by influencer Anastas… [+2832 chars]

articles.title: Asia shares at five-month highs as rate bets pile up - Reuters
articles.description: World shares gained on Thursday as market wagers on ever-more aggressive interest rate cuts stretched a rally in U.S. stocks and bonds, while the dollar fell to five-month lows.
